text: @NYGovCuomo Hello, as we prep ourselves to prevent the spread of  coronavirus— one measure is to stay away from tourists or public attractions.  So, I highly recommend you approve the accessibility of Mobile gambling in NY to avoid unnecessary trips to casinos upstate.  Thank you.
